title: Move CheckUtil#isGetterMethod and CheckUtil#isSetterMethod to MissingJavadocMethodCheck
description: Noticed at #13555, the only place we use these utility methods is in MissingJavadocMethodCheck, we should just move them there along with associated tests.
description_text: Noticed at #13555, the only place we use these utility methods is in MissingJavadocMethodCheck, we should just move them there along with associated tests.
